scripts.lighthouse: npm run dev & sleep 3 && lighthouse http://localhost:8080 --view --output html --output-path ./lighthouse-report.html; lsof -ti:8080 | xargs kill -9 2>/dev/null || true
scripts.lighthouse:index: npm run dev & sleep 3 && lighthouse http://localhost:8080/index.html --view --output html --output-path ./lighthouse-index.html; lsof -ti:8080 | xargs kill -9 2>/dev/null || true
scripts.lighthouse:photographer: npm run dev & sleep 3 && lighthouse http://localhost:8080/photographer.html?id=243 --view --output html --output-path ./lighthouse-photographer.html; lsof -ti:8080 | xargs kill -9 2>/dev/null || true
scripts.lighthouse:all: npm run dev & sleep 3 && lighthouse http://localhost:8080/index.html --output html --output-path ./lighthouse-index.html && lighthouse http://localhost:8080/photographer.html?id=243 --output html --output-path ./lighthouse-photographer.html && echo 'Reports generated: lighthouse-index.html, lighthouse-photographer.html'; lsof -ti:8080 | xargs kill -9 2>/dev/null || true
scripts.minify: npm run minify:css && npm run minify:js && npm run minify:html
scripts.minify:css: for file in assets/css/*.css; do [ -f "$file" ] && ! [[ "$file" == *.min.css ]] && lightningcss --minify --targets '> 0.5%, last 2 versions' "$file" -o "${file%.css}.min.css"; done
